C

checkQuestion() - Method in class question.Question
Check if the question is full and can be saved to the database.
CLIENT_CONNECTED - Static variable in class server.ObservableServer
The string sent to the observers when a client has connected.
CLIENT_DISCONNECTED - Static variable in class server.ObservableServer
The string sent to the observers when a client has disconnected.
CLIENT_EXCEPTION - Static variable in class server.ObservableServer
The string sent to the observers when an exception occurred with a client.
close() - Method in class server.AbstractServer
Closes the server socket and the connections with all clients.
close() - Method in class server.ConnectionToClient
Closes the client.
close() - Method in class server.ObservableServer
Closes the server's connections with all clients.
connect() - Static method in class database.MySqlConnection
Connect to the database.
ConnectionToClient - Class in server
An instance of this class is created by the server when a client connects.
Course - Class in question
This class represent the courses in the database.
Course() - Constructor for class question.Course
 
createStudent(Student) - Static method in class database.MySqlConnection
Create a student in the database (not a user).
createStudentTest(studentTest) - Static method in class database.MySqlConnection
Create a new student test in the database with the given test.
createTest(Test) - Static method in class database.MySqlConnection
Create a new test in the database.
